articles.content:
Apple significantly increased the price of existing iPad mini models in non-US markets after updating its online store with new entry-level iPad and iPad Pro models on Tuesday.

articles.description: Elton Jantjies will not be part of the Springbok squad that will travel to Europe for four Tests in November, casting further doubts over his international future.
articles.content:
• Elton Jantjies will not be selected for the Springboks' year-end tour to Europe.
